subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: A slump in corporate hospitality sales means that more tickets for the United States Open golf tournament from June 15 to 21 at Bethpage State Park will be available to the public.
snippet: A slump in corporate hospitality sales means that more tickets for the United States Open golf tournament from June 15 to 21 at Bethpage State Park will be available to the public.
